Reviews.Title: “Terrible location, questionable service, small room but good breakfast!”

Reviews.Content: tourist information office berlin booked hotel simply acceptable bad hotel recommendation moment walked didnt feel pay cash upfront card machine broken promised wifi internet connection installed socalled free street parking 8 euro day park hotel simple bathroom acceptable clean horror red heat light switch light location hotel whilst 15 min walk city centre road seedy looking car dealer gay bar district didnt feel comfortable heading dark breakfast stay offer wide variety buffet breakfast

Reviews.Title: “BB Hotel, Berlin = my bad experience”
Reviews.Author: Heathrowcountry
Reviews.Content: third visit berlin stay hotel bad experience busy weekend hotel rear hotel plug basin close properly shower head tied fabric tape television ariel missing 1800 hours days horrendous banging commenced demolition wall morning departure hotel staff offered coffee light breakfast received surly response front desk paid 300 euros nights stay decided complain writing management day received acknowledgement whatsoever berliners nice people
